department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: The Standing Offer will be issued for a term of three (3) years, for the provision of underground utility services.
full_summary:
## Notice of Amendment and Clarification: Underground Utilities Standing Offer
### Solicitation Number: WS3662757313

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is releasing an amendment to the previously published tender announcement for an Underground Utilities Standing Offer (WS6897-230050). The original tender closing time has been rescheduled.

## Important Tender Details

- **Tender Title**: Underground Utilities Standing Offer (WS6897-230050)
- **Closing Date and Time**: January 26, 2023, at 12:00 PM MST
- **Contract Duration**: Three (3) years
- **Expected Contract End Date**: October 31, 2025
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Regions of Delivery**: Medicine Hat
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **End User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)

## Description of Work
The Standing Offer will involve providing underground utility services to the Department of National Defence (DND) on an "as required" basis. This includes material, labor, equipment, supervision, and transportation necessary for:
- Excavating, repairs, and backfilling of underground water and sewer infrastructure within CFB Suffield
- Other utility infrastructure at the village of Ralston and CFB Suffield utility and natural gas field locations
- DND utility infrastructure outside the base

## Reporting and Contact

For further information, please refer to the original tender announcement or contact:
- Virakorn, Matthew (SPAC/PSPC)
- Email: matthew.virakorn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note:- Always respect the above format used, submit in the same. Codded writing or rewriting unacceptable . -
